name: AMERICAN COALITION FOR CLEAN COAL ELECTRICITY (ACCCE)
description: represent member companies associated with coal-based electricity generation
firms: VENTURE GOVERNMENT STRATEGIES, LLC (FKA HOBART HALLAWAY & QUAYLE VENTURES, LLC)
govEntities: Office of the Vice President of the United States
sampleDescriptions: Tax incentives for coal-fired power plants; H.R.5270, Electricity Reliability and Fuel Security Act; H.R.1625, Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2018 (P.L.115-141).
Issues related to high efficiency low emissions coal-fired power plants. Environmental Protection Agency regulations issued under the Clean Air Act, Clean Water Act, and the Resource Conservation and
Environmental Protection Agency regulations issued under the Clean Air Act and Clean Water Act, including the Clean Power Plan, New Source Performance Standards, and Effluent Limitations Guidelines.

Issues related to grid reliability and baseload electricity.
Staff Report to the Secretary on Electricity Markets and Reliability.
DoEs Proposed Rule to FERC regarding grid resiliency.
